description: Subtitle utilities: Provides functions to convert SRT subtitle format to WebVTT format for HTML5 <track> element usage. Includes functions to convert SRT text to WebVTT string and convert SRT Blob/File to WebVTT Blob.

methods.name: convertSrtTextToVtt(srtText)
methods.description: Converts SRT subtitle text to WebVTT formatted text, normalizing line endings, adding header, and converting timestamp commas to dots.

methods.name: convertSrtBlobToVttBlob(fileOrBlob)
methods.description: Converts an SRT file/blob to a WebVTT Blob by reading the blob as text, converting the format, and creating a new Blob.
